Congratulations on making your inaugural purchase with your new Fleet One {!Account.Card_Product_del__c} fuel card. Our goal is to make EVERY Fleet One card swipe another reason for you to value our company even more. <?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />

Agents can also help you set up your Online Account Management, so you can make changes to your cards, view transactions in real-time and more.
Thank you for choosing Fleet One for your fleet management solutions!
